{"id":512179937,"lang":"cpp","time":"2 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1624469930,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/512179937/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Roman to Integer","memory":"6.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int romanToInt(string s) {\n        char count[256] = {};\n        \n        for(char ch : s) ++count[ch];\n        \n        int result = 0;\n        \n        for(char ch : s) {\n            --count[ch];\n            \n            if(ch == 'I') {\n                if(count['V'] || count['X']) {\n                    --result;\n                } else {\n                    ++result;\n                }\n            }\n            \n            if(ch == 'X') {\n                if(count['L'] || count['C']) {\n                    result -= 10;\n                } else {\n                    result += 10;\n                }\n            }\n            \n            if(ch == 'C') {\n                if(count['D'] || count['M']) {\n                    result -= 100;\n                } else {\n                    result += 100;\n                }\n            }\n            \n            if(ch == 'V') result += 5;\n            if(ch == 'M') result += 1000;\n            if(ch == 'D') result += 500;\n            if(ch == 'L') result += 50;\n        }\n        \n        return result;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"roman-to-integer"}
